about_the_game:
"Have we all been acting waywardly?"

Break Wolf is an Adventure RPG that deals with the life and death of wayward humans,
striving to escape a syndicate that creates monsters.

You can choose to kill or save them,
and depending on who survives, the story and combat style change.







A psychological story focusing on the rough, imperfect psyches of Romit and his companions,
who are attempting to escape from a syndicate that creates monsters.




Romit, faced with disposal due to underperformance,
finds himself at a crossroads between life and death without a choice.
However, Healer Amoria, responsible for treating the monsters,
feels a sense of kinship with him and decides to help him escape.

As they make their escape, they encounter both allies and obstacles.
What thoughts and decisions will Romit make as he confronts them?







A turn-based RPG with elements of an adventure game,
featuring various interactions and skill-equipment combinations.




  • Detailed interactions between characters, with a wide variety of items
  • Various combat aspects through skill-equipment combinations
  • Additional dialogues of companions, unlocked by earning certain achievements
  • Hidden locations and diverse events
  • Over 30 types of monsters animated in full animation
  • And much more...

content_descriptors.notes:
[Mature Content Warning]
* Sexual intercourse depicted as part of a romantic relationship.
* Partial description of coercive sexual assault.
* References to and descriptions of drug injections for physical enhancement.
* Description of flesh being torn off.

* Access to some adult content is not available in the demo version.
